metadata.description:
'Gorilla in a Pink Mask' NFT, has been split into 10,000 segments magnified x 40. The animated NFT shows the artwork with crosshairs pinpointing the location of each fraction. The other side documents its purity level with a rarity score. 

 These were calculated by an algorithm that took into account 128 colours. These were then reduced to the pixel intensity of the five colours - pink, dark grey, light grey, ochre and sand. Exposed Walls place no commercial value on these evaluations, rarity is based on colour purity only. 

Rarity is ranked from 1 - 100 with 1 being the rarest, indicated by the colour of the gorilla head stamp. Below is their occurrence of these in the edition. 

 Gold: 16 — Silver: 31 — Bronze: 44 — Black: 9909
metadata.name: Banksy #1
